about_the_game:
In the magical world, you can explore mysterious underground castles, claustrophobic deep dungeons, boundless caves with changing environments, and a bizarre abyss underground world.



During the journey full of unknowns, you can admire the splendid and magnificent ancient castles, and you can also wander in the grotesque natural scenery. That's the real meaning of this journey.



Classic horizontal board action game, the character operation is very smooth, and has a wealth of operation space: double jump, sliding shovel, wall climbing, wall jumping and so on.

Open the vast magic castle world, the intricate roads lead to different places, you can freely choose the way forward, don't be afraid of going the wrong way, you can turn around at any time, but be careful not to get lost.



There are dozens of different weapons in the game. Different weapons can bring completely different fighting styles. Find the most suitable powerful weapon for you.

Search for powerful scrolls! Explore ancient energy! These ancient treasures are indispensable in your travels.



The 3D game scene brings a gorgeous visual feast, bringing a unique sense of hierarchy to the game world, and at the same time depicts the magnificence of magic civilization.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel 2Core 2.8G or AMD 2Core 3.0G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 640 or AMD R7 250 or Intel hd 4600 (720p)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 , 8 , 10 , 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD R7 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card

short_description: "Evil Castle & Princess" is a game similar to Metroid Castlevania, mainly a horizontal action game based on exploration and combat. Wear your favorite weapons to explore the mysterious and dangerous relic castle! Destroy all the monsters that block you and find the secrets of the magic castle.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
